title: API: Create tick
description:
POST /api/ticks endpoint:
- Accepts JSON body: title, description, type, priority, parent, requires
- Creates tick using tick.Store
- Returns created tick JSON
acceptance_criteria:
- POST /api/ticks with JSON body creates tick
- Required: title
- Optional: description, type, priority, parent, requires
- Returns created tick with ID
- 400 for missing title
closed_reason: Implemented POST /api/ticks endpoint in server.go. Added CreateTickRequest/CreateTickResponse types. Handler validates title, applies defaults (type=task, priority=2, owner=tickboard), generates unique ID using tick.IDGenerator, saves using tick.Store, returns created tick with computed isBlocked and column fields. Returns 201 Created. Added 8 tests covering basic creation, all fields, validation errors, and computed column.
